name: Run, Astro, Run
description:
Run, Astro, Run is a runner game with gravity change.

You have to run through 7 difficult levels. Challenge yourself and try to beat the game.

- Features -

  • 1+ hour long.
  • Increasing difficulty of the game.
  • 7 challenging levels.

CONTROLS

W = Jump

D = Run

A = Walk

SPACE = Сhange of gravity.

ESC = Menu
